entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 with frost.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6 with frost. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
